msg: Switched tests to run using maven-plugin-testing-tools from the sandbox (it's bound for the shared component space eventually), so I can reuse the plugin-staging code elsewhere.

author: jdcasey
msg: Creating new project to stage plugin artifacts to a testing localRepo, execute maven builds via the maven-invoker, and other similar things used to test plugin projects.
